text: Ia, Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, a ko mɨkɨmasa nan azangsɨgha, kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Jeremaia, nɨ mangɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, en God, nɨ a ko mɨkɨm, egh an azaraghtɨ, an akam e danɨngigh. Eghtɨ akar manam a nɨ danightɨ, nɨ e mɨkemeghtɨ, e an gɨn mangam.’ Ezɨ ia datɨrɨghɨn arazir igharazim damuasava ami. Ian arazir kam, a bar derazir puvatɨ. A ia damutɨ, ia ikuvigham.
